productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(*) AS result FROM customer WHERE date_created >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), 1) AND date_created < DATEADD(month, 1, DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), 1));
calculationType: Customer metrics for the appropriate calendar month.

productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.customer_id) AS result FROM customer c JOIN oe_hdr o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), 1) AND o.order_date < DATEADD(month, 1, DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), 1)) AND c.date_created < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month,-11,GETDATE())), 1);
calculationType: Customer metrics for the appropriate calendar month.
